GSP29vnyps41u:2: nyā. pa. śa. 49 atha smṛtirnirūpyate--- saṃskāramātrajaṃ jñānaṃ smṛtiḥ,
GSP29vnyps41u:5: bhramasambhavocceti cenna, smṛtimātrāprāmāṇyasya prathamāhnikre pratikṣiptatvāt, avādhitabāhyārthadarśanāt,
GSP29vnyps41u:6: atītānāgataviṣayānumānādibādhaprasaṅgāt, sarvalokavirodhāt, ananubhūte arthāntarepi smṛtiprasaṅgāt, smṛterapi svaprakāśatvepi vedyākāre
GSP29vnyps41u:8: na ca pūrvānubhavapuraskāreṇaiva grahaṇādaprāmāṇyamiti cenna, smṛtipramoṣe
GSP29vnyps41u:15: tadvadevājñānatvaprasaṅgāt; jñānameva hi svato viṣayapravaṇamicchasi; ata eva hi nityayorapi riśvaracikīrṣāprayatnayorviṣaya niyamāya jñānāpekṣāṃ brūṣe /
GSP29vnyps41u:16: icchādīnāmapi svato viṣayaprāvaṇyaṃ jñānatvaṃ cāsmābhiḥ svīkṛtam /
GSP29vnyps41u:20: tathā ca samānaviṣayānubhavajanyatvatadabhāvābhyāṃ smṛtyanubhavayoḥ pāratantryasvātantryavyavahāro mandānām /
GSP29vnyps41u:24: prābhākarāṇāmanumānādau naiyāyikādīnāṃ dhārāvāhikādau yogasiddhasarvajñavādināṃ dvitīyayogapratyakṣādau keṣāñcidīśvaravādināmanityeśvarajñāne ca vyabhicārācca /
GSP29vnyps41u:26: tṛṇādiviṣayapratnayakṣādinānaikāntyāt, asiddheśca;smṛtyaiva hi jagatāṃ kṛtākṛtapratyavekṣaṇādisiddhiḥ; smṛtyaiva hi śabdānumānayoḥ pravṛtiḥ;
GSP29vnyps41u:28: pūrvānubhuvasyaiva tāniprayojanānīticet, sarvajagadādikāraṇasya brahmasaṃkalpasyaiva kiṃ na syuḥ ? /
GSP29vnyps41u:29: evaṃ cānubhavasyāpi na tatsiddhiḥ, tatkāraṇasyeti vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
GSP29vnyps41u:34: pāmaravyavadvārābhāvasyānaikāntikatvāt, evaṃ parīkṣakavyavahāra bhāvasyāpi; vigītatvācca; sarvaparīkṣakavyavahārābhāvasya cāsiddheḥ;
GSP29vnyps41u:38: indrapāṇinyādīnāṃ tu sarvasaṃpratipatterabādhāccādarāt, pārāśaryādīnāṃ pramāṇaparigaṇanānadhikṛtatvena tadanukteraprayojakatvāt, āgamaḥ pramāṇamityapi vyavahārābhāvāt /
GSP29vnyps41u:43: “apramāṇamūlatvaṃ tu ubhayorapi nāsti, vyabhicārābhāvenānadhigatārthaṃ pramāṇamiti viśeṣaṇasyāyuktatvāt
GSP29vnyps41u:45: smṛtau cet, pratijñaiva dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt; jñānāntare cenna nujānāmi” ityādi
GSP29vnyps41u:47: nātivyāptiḥ smṛtau vyāptiryathārthena hi sā pramā” //
GSP29vnyps41u:50: nanu tāmapi vyāpnoti lakṣaṇamya ; satyam; tadvyāptau nātivyāptiḥ, tasyāpi lakṣyapakṣe nikṣepāt
GSP29vnyps41u:55: smṛtivyatiriktaṃ jñānamanubhavaḥ” ityādinā smṛteraprāmāṇyamuktamiva śrīviṣṇucittaiḥ, tannūnaṃ paramatānvāroheṇa /
GSP29vnyps41u:56: ata eva hi taiḥ svataḥ prāmāṇyanirṇayadaśāyāmanyathā vyavahṛtam /
GSP29vnyps41u:57: tathāhi--- “tasmāt siddhametat pramāṇānāṃ yathārthatvalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ guṇajñānānapekṣāt svapramāṇādevāvasīyate, svakīyāt kāraṇādeva jñāyata iti
GSP29vnyps41u:61: “na ca hetorasiddhatvam; tathāhi--- rajatajñānasyārthatathātvaṃ nāma rajataviṣayatvam; taccāsati bādhake rajatagrāhiṇaiva jñānenāvagamyate”
GSP29vnyps41u:68: yadi cānubhava eva pramāṇam, tanna yuktamupayuktaṃ vā /
GSP29vnyps41u:74: pramāṇameva tatpūrvaṃ na cet svārthaṃ vigāhate” //
GSP29vnyps41u:76: anyathā smṛtipramoṣe pramuṣitatadaṃśe pūrvānubhavapuraskāreṇa svārthāvagāhanāsiddheḥ kathaṃ tatra smṛtitvanibandhanamaprāmāṇyaṃ bhaviṣyati ? //
GSP29vnyps41u:77: nyā. pa. śa. 50 yattu bhāṣye sanmātragrāhipratyakṣanirākaraṇadaśāyāmuktam-- “aśve hastini ca saṃvedanayorekaviṣayatvenoparitanasya gṛhītagrāhitvād viśeṣābhāvācca
GSP29vnyps41u:78: smṛtivailakṣaṇyaṃ na syāt” iti, na tatra smṛteraprāmāṇyaṃ sūcitam,
GSP29vnyps41u:81_0: yat svasamakālavartinaḥ padārthasya grāhakatvam, na tu sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ pramāṇānāṃ ca, smaraṇānumānāgamayogipratyakṣādiṣu
GSP29vnyps41u:81_1: kālāntaravartinopi grahaṇadarśanāt” ityādi, tatrāpi parasyāniṣṭaprasaṅgāya tadabhiprāyānudhāvanena vibhajyodāharaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP29vnyps41u:83: “bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajanmanastasya viśadāvabhāsatvepi pūrvānubhūtaviṣayasmṛtimātratvānna prāmāṇyamiti kutaḥ pratyakṣatā ?” iti,
GSP29vnyps41u:84: idamapi na sākṣāt siddhāntastham; na ca yāthārthyaṃ tatra pratikṣiptam /
GSP29vnyps41u:87: tata eva ca tadekadeśibhirapi tatprāmāṇyaṃ svīkṛtam, iti //
GSP29vnyps41u:88: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau smṛtyadhyāye prathamamāhnikam //
